citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS Official during the inspection process at 10:51 AM on 01
January 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by text message, she replied saying that she was
unavailable, and she did not have any other adult available for an inspection. Licensee stated by text that she would be
available for an inspection at 1 PM.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS Official during the inspection process at 10:51 AM on 01 
January 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by text message, she replied saying that she was 
unavailable, and she did not have any other adult available for an inspection. Licensee stated by text that she would be 
available for an inspection at 1 PM.  
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
